title: zom10
author: zom10
created_time: June 27, 2022, 08:38:01 PMLast edit: November 02, 2022, 07:37:25 AM by zom10
content: Quantum DAO Fundhttps://quantumdao.org/Quantum DAO Fund Welcome to the DAO investing revolution!A decentralised venture capital platformQuantum DAO is revolutionising investing by changing the way communities and capital work together through accessible, simple and social web3 technologies.Today's investment models exclude investors with small capital from the venture capital process.The Quantum DAO platform democratises investment, allowing capital to be invested like never before. It is a future that is more open, free and fair.The goal of Quantum DAO platform is to unite investors and business angels into one decentralized pool of shareholders for investments in startups, companies, real estate, and crypto funds.For the rapid development of our platform, we plan to attract private investors and funds by creating favourable and attractive conditions for them.Now the first round of ICO (Pre-ICO) of 10 million QDO tokens is taking place. Bonuses!GENERAL RULESWe are allocating 300 000 QDO Tokens✔️All rewards will be available in your personal account: https://lk-quantum.com/✔️After the end of the ICO, you will receive a reward to your Metamask wallet.✔️ Bounty will run 12 week✔️ The token distribution process to participants (our supporters) will be arranged and carried out by the Quantum DAO team.✔️ Participants who do not follow the rules of each campaign will not get stakes/reward✔️ All participants must join Dashboard: https://lk-quantum.com/  Registration in Dashboard-10 QDO (250$) bonus✔️ All participants must join Telegram:  https://t.me/quantumdaofund✔️ All participants must join Twitter:  https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum✔️ Using multiple accounts, cheating, and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately, and all your accounts will be banned permanently.✔️ We reserve the right to suspend or have the allocation reduced on a certain bounty if we found it underperforming.✔️ We reserve the right to make changes on any terms if it’s reasonable to do so✔️ We reserve the right to remove a participant from the campaign for a valid reason.✔️ By agreeing to this rule, you are subject to the existing rulesProof of Authentication Post FormatCode:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:telegram Username:Campaign Participated:Name in Dashboard https://lk-quantum.com/     Registration in Dashboard-10 QDO (250$) bonusThe BSC-20 address does not need to be left. Example:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username: zom10Bitcointalk Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3102585telegram Username:QuantumdaosupportCampaign Participated: twitterName in Dashboard https://lk-quantum.com/ : Frank HarveyBounty SheduleWeek 1 (28.06 - 5.07)Week 2 (6.07 - 13.07)Week 3 (14.07 - 21.07)Week 4 (22.07 - 29.07)Week 5 (2.08 - 9.08)Week 6 (9.08 - 16.08)Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Twitter CampaignRewards:- Have more than 500 followers: 10 QDO (250$)/week- Have more than 2500 followers: 20 QDO (500$)/week- Have more than 5001 followers: 30 QDO (750$)/week- Have more than 10,001 followers: 40 QDO (1000$)/ /week Rules:  - Every participant must follow the  https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum- Twitter account must have a minimum of 500 followers- Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit)- You must make minimum of 5 retweets & 3 tweets per week. Mention Quantum DAO Fund, use a minimum of 3 hashtags, a maximum of 10, use a different hashtag every tweet or retweets  #bitcoin  #ido #bitcoinnews #investment  #investor #investingtips #diskusi #discus #medsos #mediapartner #socialmedia #ico #teknologi #technology #techno #application #dao #nft  #nfts #ethereum #nft #dao #investor #blockchain #blockchaintechnology #blockchainnews #blockchainwallet- Every retweet must be likedReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Bitcointalk username:Twitter Profile Link:Name in Dashboard https://lk-quantum.com/ :Week 1Retweet Link 1Retweet Link 2Retweet Link 3Retweet Link 4Retweet Link 5Week 1Tweet Link 1Tweet Link 2Tweet Link 3To get a bounty for a week, the report must be completed in full.Example:Week 1 (28.06 - 5.07)Bitcointalk username:zom10Name in Dashboard https://lk-quantum.com/ : Frank HarveyWeek 1Retweet Link 1 https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum/status/1538807383325126656Retweet Link 2 https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum/status/1538807718873550848Retweet Link 3 https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum/status/1541870356536901632Retweet Link 4 https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum/status/1534593314602762241Retweet Link 5 https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum/status/1538173089124605953Week 1Tweet Link 1 https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum/status/1534593314602762241Tweet Link 2 https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum/status/1534592770295443456Tweet Link 3 https://twitter.com/DaoQuantum/status/1534592770295443456
